text: Dangerous is a 2008 R&B; song by Kardinal Offishall and featured R&B; singer Akon. The song was released March 2008 on the radio and April 1, 2008 on iTunes. The song is from Kardinal Offishall's 2008 album, Not 4 Sale. The song won Single of the Year at the 2009 Juno Awards and was certified 3x Platinum by the CRIA. Category:2008 songs Category:Akon songs
title: Dangerous (Kardinal Offishall song)
